column2: Role/ Job Title:  Associate Credit Operations Manager Function/ Department:   Retail Assets Job Purpose: The role bearer's responsibilities entail managing the entire credit application process, right from login to disbursement for Mortgage products. The role bearer is involved in development and implementation of credit policy initiatives and managing the quality of the portfolio. The role bearer will be in direct contact with the consumers to establish their credit, worthiness, ensuring completion of verifications and adhering to the guidelines set as per the company credit policy. The execution of these tasks must be accomplished in such manner which is both sales supportive and risk averse contributing to the larger organizational objectives of the bank. Roles & Responsibilities: Handling original property papers for loan applications. Performing on-ground disbursal activities like cheque management, documents for legal vetting etc. Work with sales teams and credit teams to resolve queries related to the documents in a timely manner. Liaise with legal and technical vendors for verifications of documents. Managing a team of local operations officers responsible for performing post disbursal checks and collection and scanning of physical documents. Ensuring adherence to set SLA and TAT targets for E2E loan disbursal. Education Qualification:  Graduation: Any Graduate Post Graduation: Any Postgraduate Experience:  2 to 5 years of experience.

column2: Job Description :    The Associate Vice President is an integral member of our team working directly with Vice Presidents and Senior Management in all facets of our business,  including origination and execution of transactions,  and building relationships with clients.    Responsibilities   Work on a wide range of assignments/ transactions,  from initial client pitches    through transaction closings,  including equity and debt private placements; mergers and acquisitions; and other strategic advisory services.    Lead transaction due diligence with minimal supervision    Communicate regulatory,  financial information and complex strategic issues in a clear,  concise and relevant manner to assist and guide transaction structure   Ability to market services both to internal partners and external clients,  develop client networks,  and support efforts in developing and executing strategies for client acquisition   Ensure quality of client deliverables by having a strong attention to detail    Mentor and develop junior staff    Individuals will be assigned a wide variety of projects and given as much responsibility as their experience and capabilities permit   Qualifications   4- 6 years of experience at an investment bank or boutique M&A or private equity advisory firm with solid transaction experience across a range of transaction types    Demonstrated experience in managing of day- to- day aspects of client relationships and transactions with superior attention to detail and quality deliverables   Superior research and business/ financial analysis skills    Superior financial modeling skills with solid experience in accounting and business valuation techniques    Exceptional written and verbal communication skills    Knowledge of microfinance or social investment space,  desirable   Native Hindi speaker,  desirable   MBA with major in Finance or Economics (or equivalent degree),  desirable    Demonstrated ability to work independently coupled with solid team skills    Strong working knowledge of Microsoft Office Applications,  and specifically Excel and Powerpoint   Willingness to travel domestically and internationally (up to 50% of time away from Bangalore)    A passion for making a difference

column2: Job Description :    The Associate is a key member of the company,  and this position presents an excellent opportunity to work on a variety of innovative transactions for impact businesses,  with exposure to different industry sectors,  geographies and capital markets products.    Transaction Execution   Associates will be a part of a 3 member transaction execution team and will be responsible for executing the transactions end- to- end with the team.    This will involve (i) aiding preparation of materials like information memorandum,  financial models,  teasers,  competitive analyses and mapping,  valuation models etc.,  working with junior analysts /  analysts as the case may be (ii) day to day management of investor calls and meetings,  aiding senior members in leading investor conversations (iii) Aiding senior team members in term sheet and SHA /  SSA discussions and negotiations (iv) Relationship building with the client and relevant counterparts in the client team.    The Associate will have the necessary experience and skill sets to guide on /  finalise marketing materials like information memorandum and business projections with adequate strategic guidance from the senior on the transaction team.    Business Development   Associates will have the additional responsibility to support respective sector leads in business development including (i) To research and analyze industry,  economic,  market,  and regulatory data as required to support sector coverage activities (ii) Assist in preparing presentations /  marketing materials for use in client coverage,  other business development activities,  conferences,  etc.    Corporate Development   Associates will also be jointly responsible with the rest of the team for helping with internal initiatives such as maintaining sector and investor databases,  revenue /  transaction milestone tracking,  corporate presentations and business development materials,  newsletters and company website.    Support senior team members and clients in any other ancillary tasks from time to time as the case may be    Skills   At least 3 years of relevant experience in capital raise advisory/ investment banking rolesMBA from a premier institution    Excellent skills with MS Word,  Excel and Powerpoint    High degree of expertise in building and anlysing financial models    High degree of expertise in making investment memorandum,  presentations,  conducting secondary research,  industry analysis etc    Experience with or networks with venture capital and private equity ecosystem in India    Strong fundamental understanding of accounting and financial statement analysis    Strong understanding of business valuation techniques,  including comparable company/ transaction analysis and discounted cash flow analysis    Strong desire to work hard    Superior analytical and problem solving skills    Ability to multi- task    Strong attention to detail and dedication to quality    Excellent communication skills,  both written and verbal    Self- starter,  with solid team skills
column11: Relationship building, Analytical, Venture capital, Cash flow, Financial statement analysis, HTML, Investment banking, Business valuation, Private equity, Secondary research

column2: Overview: As a Banking Manager specializing in Payment Gateway Channel Relations, your primary responsibility will be to establish and nurture strong relationships with key payment gateway channels in India, including SBI, IndusInd, ICICI, Axis, YES BANK, etc. You will serve as the primary point of contact between our organization and these financial institutions, ensuring smooth collaboration and optimal performance of payment processing services. Role & responsibilities   1. Relationship Management:    - Cultivate and maintain strong, collaborative relationships with key stakeholders at SBI, Indusind, ICICI, Axis, YES BANK, and other payment gateway channels.    - Regularly engage with channel partners to understand their needs, concerns, and strategic objectives.    - Act as a liaison between our organization and payment gateway channels, facilitating communication and resolving any issues that may arise. 2. Business Development:    - Identify opportunities for growth and expansion within existing partnerships with payment gateway channels.    - Collaborate with internal teams to develop strategies for increasing transaction volumes and revenue streams through these channels.    - Explore new business opportunities and partnerships within the payment ecosystem to enhance our market presence and competitiveness. 3. Performance Monitoring and Optimization:    - Monitor the performance of payment processing services provided by each channel partner, ensuring compliance with service level agreements (SLAs) and industry standards.    - Analyze transaction data and key performance indicators (KPIs) to identify areas for improvement and optimization.    - Work closely with technical teams to address any technical issues or discrepancies related to payment processing. 4. Compliance and Risk Management:    - Stay abreast of regulatory requirements and industry best practices related to payment processing and financial services.    - Ensure that all activities related to payment gateway channels comply with relevant regulations and internal policies.    - Identify and mitigate any potential risks or compliance issues associated with payment processing activities. Preferred candidate profile   - Bachelor's degree in Business Administration, Finance, or a related field. MBA or equivalent preferred. - Proven experience (7+ years) in banking, financial services, or payment processing, with a focus on relationship management and business development. - In-depth knowledge of the Indian banking and payment industry, including key players, regulations, and emerging trends. - Strong interpersonal and communication skills, with the ability to build and maintain effective relationships with stakeholders at all levels. - Analytical mindset with the ability to interpret data and metrics to drive decision-making and performance improvement. - Familiarity with payment processing technologies and platforms is a plus. - Excellent organizational skills and attention to detail, with the ability to manage multiple priorities and deadlines effectively. - Must be ready to go for business trips and meetings - Relationship with NPCI background is an added advantage - Must have work experience in Axis, ICICI, Yes bank, IDFC, HDFC, SBI bank, etc or a powerful relationship with any of these banks.
column11: Banking relationships, Banking Operations, Payment Gateways, NPCI, payment gateway, Upi

column11: Administration, Business operations

column2: A Startup CA operations manager is an individual who carries out administrative and accounting duties in a financial institution by organising and coordinating banking services.      His/her job description involves managing his/her banks operations team to deliver effective financial services to clients.      He/she is responsible for ensuring outstanding customer relations and high sales, as well as imbibing the banks service culture in all staff members through personal coaching and granting of bonuses and other incentives to motivate staff.      In order to achieve best results in due time, operations managers need to delegate duties to various team members, giving them specific tasks to accomplish for the overall success of banking operations .      The role of the operations manager in a banking environment also involves carrying out assessment of the activities and performances of the banking staff by evaluating transaction reports and accounts balance for accuracy and clarity.      The operations manager, who is directly answerable to the head of banking services, is also required as part of his/her job functions to ensure that the laid down goals and objectives of the company are maintained by all staff.      He/she is also expected to give useful suggestions to the management on how to improve on the banks operation.      Operations managers are professionals with huge knowledge and experience gathered from several years of working in the banking sector.       Role Responsibilities-What you need to do       Own all branch-banking objectives and overall branch supervision      Ensure achievement of overall Branch Targets by generating business and cross sales Key Customer Relationship Management supervision of all High Net Worth customer programs      Ensure all components of the branch sales model function as per design      Review Suspense Dummy accounts      Ensure compliance with Banking rules, Regulations Procedures Periodic review of progress vs. objectives      Ensure clarity of Business objectives among staff. Industry-relevant Production Experience      Knowledge and experience in organizational effectiveness and operations management      Knowledge of business and management principles and practices      Knowledge of financial and accounting principles and practices      Knowledge of human resource principles and practices
column11: Administration, Operations management, Branch banking, Design review, Finance, Branch sales, ITES, Operations, Financial services, CRM
